vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.12;
son of: Eshton (H0850);
brother of: Beth-rapha (H1051) , Tehinnah (H8468)
§ Paseah or Phaseah = "limper"
1) son of Eshton of the tribe of Judah
2) ancestor of a family of temple slaves who returned from exile with Zerubbabel
3) father of Jehoiada, one who helped repair the wall of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Estón; tribu de Judá; (b)   jefe de familia; sirvientes del templo; post exílico; (c)   padre de Joiadá; tiempo de Nehemías
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
巴西亞 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "跛子"
1) 猶大人, 伊施屯的兒子 (代上 4:12)
2) 被所羅巴伯歸回的尼提寧 (拉 2:49; 尼 7:51)
3) 尼希米時代修築耶路撒冷的人 (尼 3:6)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
巴西亚 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "跛子"
1) 犹大人, 伊施屯的儿子 (代上 4:12)
2) 被所罗巴伯归回的尼提宁 (拉 2:49; 尼 7:51)
3) 尼希米时代修筑耶路撒冷的人 (尼 3:6)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.49
§ Paseah or Phaseah = "limper"
1) son of Eshton of the tribe of Judah
2) ancestor of a family of temple slaves who returned from exile with Zerubbabel
3) father of Jehoiada, one who helped repair the wall of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.3.6;
father of: Joiada (H3111)
§ Paseah or Phaseah = "limper"
1) son of Eshton of the tribe of Judah
2) ancestor of a family of temple slaves who returned from exile with Zerubbabel
3) father of Jehoiada, one who helped repair the wall of Jerusalem in the time of Nehemiah
